suite.name: CartTests

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//span[@class='u-text--body-lead u-text--bold' and text()='TOTAL :']' did not exist.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

test.name: Add Products And Verify Cart

kw.name: Add First N Products To Cart
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Convert To Integer
kw.doc: Converts the given item to an integer number.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=(//article[contains(@class, 'c-productCard')])[1]//input[@type="button" and @aria-label="Ajouter"]' not visible after 10 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=(//article[contains(@class, 'c-productCard')])[1]//input[@type="button" and @aria-label="Ajouter"]' not visible after 10 seconds.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go Back
kw.doc: Simulates the user clicking the back button on their browser.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

test.status: Element 'xpath=(//article[contains(@class, 'c-productCard')])[1]//input[@type="button" and @aria-label="Ajouter"]' not visible after 10 seconds.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
